teams.name: Cincinnati
teams.loan_because: Cincinnati is a great town with great individuals. Just wanted to provide another means to show that to the world.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Savannah Country Day School
teams.loan_because: We loan because we want to empower our neighbors around the world to improve their lives. We hope to learn about them, their culture and customs, and to better understand ourselves in the process.
teams.description: Savannah Country Day School strives to cultivate in each student the desire and the discipline to grow in wisdom, to lead lives of personal honor, to appreciate beauty, to pursue physical well being, and to serve others with a compassionate and generous spirit.

teams.name: Russia
teams.loan_because: we can
teams.description: Russians that make a difference

teams.name: Scona Loaners
teams.loan_because: We want to help others write a better story for their lives.  We want to leave a powerful legacy that will make a difference in the world.
teams.description:
Strathcona high school's motto is "As one who serves".  Microloans is our school's choice for a global initiative this year.

Head to http://twitter.com/#!/sconaloaners
http://strathconaschool.ca/
Our e-mail address is sconaloaners@gmail.com

teams.loan_because:

http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Kiva City
teams.loan_because: We support small business owners in the United States.
teams.description:
We support small businesses and want to do more to bring Kiva to cities in the U.S.

If you are interested in loaning to small business owners in the U.S. or if you want to help bring Kiva to your city, this team is a community to expand the reach of Kiva in America.

We come together to make a change in our world.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.
teams.description: Portuguese Lenders Team

teams.name: University of St. Thomas
teams.loan_because: We can be the change we want to see.
teams.description: We know that there are people less fortunate out there... A little of our time and money can go a long ways... By empowering entrepreneurial spirit, we encourage a gift that keeps on giving. Together we can make a direct difference in someone's life.

teams.name: Ian Martin Group
teams.loan_because:
We see a world with each and every person pursuing meaningful work.

So in 2014, we are "Redeeming the Resume Black Hole" by asking all 100,000+ people who apply to jobs through the Ian Martin Group, to use our funds to make a loan on Kiva!

For more:
http://ianmartin.com/blog/2014/01/redeeming-the-resume-black-hole/

Check out our progress here: http://www.kiva.org/team/ianmartin/goals
teams.description:
Founded in 1957, the Ian Martin Group is North America's most progressive recruitment and project-staffing firm.  As a Certified B Corporation, we meet comprehensive standards that measure our impact on employees, suppliers, community, and the environment. Our guiding statement is: “building authentic connections around meaningful work.”
 
The Ian Martin family includes technical recruitment divisions IME, IMT and IMIT – experts in Engineering, Telecom and IT respectively. The 500 Staffing is best understood as 'not so’ General Staffing and Ian Martin Executive which focuses on providing exceptional business leadership to technical and scientific centered organizations. 

http://ianmartin.com
http://ianmartin.com/blog
https://twitter.com/IanMartinGroup
https://facebook.com/IanMartinGroup
http://bcorporation.net/ianmartingroup

teams.name: McGraw Hill Financial
teams.loan_because:
Corporate Responsibility is fundamental to MHFI. It guides who we are, how we conduct ourselves and how we interact with those around us.

Corporate Responsibility Essentials at MHFI encompass:

– Financial Essentials – we help to provide the fundamental financial knowledge that can build better lives, stronger communities and stable economies and financial markets. 

– Community Essentials – we help deploy and foster the resources and skills that lead to smarter, stronger, more inclusive communities. Our employees are integral partners in our dedication to this critical purpose. 

– Environmental Essentials – we offer innovative business services that promote sustainability while applying best practice to reduce the environmental footprint of our operations.
teams.description:
McGraw Hill Financial is a high-growth, high-margin benchmarks, content and analytics company serving the capital and commodity markets. MHFI believes a responsible business is one that delivers value for investors, customers, employees and communities; makes wise use of natural resources; and treats people fairly.

We are home to some of the most iconic brands in finance and business, including: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services, S&P Capital IQ, S&P Dow Jones Indices, Platts, J.D. Power, and McGraw Hill Construction. Our independent credit ratings, indices, analytics, price assessments and research provide clients with the essential intelligence to manage risk and identify opportunities to grow.

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Loan Taggers
teams.loan_because:
Everything you want to know about the Loan Taggers team is on this page. If you would like to make a suggestion, please send a private message to one of the team captains.

Loan Taggers was formed to coordinate the efforts of volunteers who will systematically review and tag all of the loans posted to the Kiva website. Having all loans reviewed and tagged to the same standards will enable lenders to find loans they are interested in faster, and can help to get loans funded before they expire.

Current tagging status: docs.google.com/spreadsheet
docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AkRBX8P18KLadHY0UllxZ3ljT2E2dlBYRXpEd3Blemc&usp=sharing
teams.description:
Tag Definitions: If you are just interested in the definitions we use for each tag, please go to 
http://kivaloantaggers.blogspot.com/2013/09/tag-definitions.html
Feel free to leave comments on how you would like a tag to be used or not used.

If you are interested in joining the Loan Taggers, please pick 
1) The weekday which you want to spend tagging your loans (say Saturday). 
2) 1-3 different sectors you want to tag (say Food). You can also sign up for Clean up Crew (loans closest to expiration, all sectors).
3) The number of loans you want to tag (30 or more. With a little practice you can tag 1 loan per minute, so 30 loans = 30 min).
4) Join the team and post your picks on the message board: "Saturday / Food / 30 loans"
5) Check the team board and your personal message folder the next Saturday for a list of 30 loans to be tagged.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?
